Cool Works

Sustyle

MVP website focused on the latest sustainability articles. HTML5, CSS3, and Bulma for the front-end, and Ruby, Ruby on Rails for the back-end, as well as PostgresSQL for the DB.

Live Demo

Private Events

Fully functional event website in which users can attend other user's events. The scope is to test the knowledge of models, controllers, views, and tests but primarily, the associations between tables in the database. I used Ruby on Rails, Ruby, HTML5, and Bulma.

Live Demo

EasyWeather

I use OpenWeather API to display the temp and conditions of the weather of the desired city. Javascript and Bulma were the tools selected for the front-end as well as webpack.

Live Demo
